mapper.sql: LIITM, LIMCU, LILOCN, LILOTN, LIPBIN, LIGLPT, LIPQOH, LIPBCK, LIPREQ, LIQWBO, LIHCOM, LIPCOM, LIFCOM, LIFUN1, LIQOWO, LIQTTR, LILOTS, LILRCJ, LIOT1P, LIOT2P, LIOT1A, LIQTIN, LIQTO1, LIQTO2, LIQONL, LIQTRI, LIQTRO, LINCDJ, LIQTY1, LIQTY2, LICSID, LIURCD, LIURDT, LIURAT, LIURAB, LIURRF, LIUSER, LIUPMJ, JDE_UpdateDate, KT_ProcessDate, KT_FailDate, KT_RetryTimes, KT_ErrorLog, fms_process_date
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from Inventory
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into Inventory (LIITM, LIMCU, LILOCN, LILOTN, LIPBIN, LIGLPT, LIPQOH, LIPBCK, LIPREQ, LIQWBO, LIHCOM, LIPCOM, LIFCOM, LIFUN1, LIQOWO, LIQTTR, LILOTS, LILRCJ, LIOT1P, LIOT2P, LIOT1A, LIQTIN, LIQTO1, LIQTO2, LIQONL, LIQTRI, LIQTRO, LINCDJ, LIQTY1, LIQTY2, LICSID, LIURCD, LIURDT, LIURAT, LIURAB, LIURRF, LIUSER, LIUPMJ, JDE_UpdateDate, KT_ProcessDate, KT_FailDate, KT_RetryTimes, KT_ErrorLog, fms_process_date) values (#{liitm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{limcu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lilocn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lilotn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lipbin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liglpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lipqoh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lipbck,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lipreq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqwbo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lihcom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lipcom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lifcom,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lifun1,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqowo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqttr,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lilots,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lilrcj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{liot1p,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liot2p,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liot1a,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqtin,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqto1,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqto2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqonl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqtri,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqtro,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lincdj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{liqty1,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liqty2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{licsid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liurcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liurdt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{liurat,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liurab,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{liurrf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liupmj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jdeUpdatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ktProcessdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ktFaildate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ktRetrytimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ktErrorlog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmsProcessDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
